thread.title: Trump slams IU grad Mark Cuban; Cuban says 'lol'
thread.title_full: Trump slams IU grad Mark Cuban; Cuban says 'lol'

author: allison.carter@indystar.com
title: Trump slams IU grad Mark Cuban; Cuban says 'lol'
text:
Trump slams IU grad Mark Cuban; Cuban says 'lol' Allison Carter , allison.carter@indystar.com 3:50 p.m. ET Feb. 12, 2017 Buy Photo Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban walks the red carpet before the start of the Indianapolis 500 at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway, Sunday, May 25, 2014, in Indianapolis. (Photo: Brent Drinkut/IndyStar) Buy Photo 554 CONNECT 2 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
President Donald Trump seems angry with Mavericks owner and Indiana University graduate Mark Cuban. But Cuban's not really sure why. 
Fresh off a state visit with Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, Trump got his Sunday morning off on the right foot by calling Cuban dumb. I know Mark Cuban well. He backed me big-time but I wasn't interested in taking all of his calls.He's not smart enough to run for president! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 12, 2017 
Cuban responded succinctly: — Mark Cuban (@mcuban) February 12, 2017 
Cuban, an entrepreneur who currently owns the Dallas Mavericks and appears on the TV show "Shark Tank," followed up by sharing a screenshot of a pair of emails -- one purportedly from Trump, the other Cuban's own response: 
Cuban eventually came out in support of Hillary Clinton in the 2016 election. 
It's not immediately clear why the president chose to go after Cuban today. When asked by a Twitter user, Cuban didn't have an answer. But he did have a comeback. I don't know. But isn't it better for all of us that he is tweeting rather than trying to govern ? https://t.co/953MuEdfeu — Mark Cuban (@mcuban) February 12, 2017 
This is far from the first time Trump has tweeted about Cuban -- usually negatively. Since 2013, Trump has tweeted at least 20 times about the basketball team owner. Trump has called Cuban a "loser," a "jerk," and in his most recent tweet prior to today's, "dopey." 
Allison Carter is Facebook editor at IndyStar. Follow her on Twitter @AllisonLCarter . 554 CONNECT 2 COMMENT EMAIL MORE Read or Share this story: http://indy.st/2kzK5I0 TOP VIDEOS
